  <title>Wells included in fields (zoom to view)</title>
  <abstract>&lt;DIV STYLE="text-align:Left;">&lt;DIV>&lt;DIV>&lt;P>&lt;SPAN>This web layer/service contains Wyoming oil and gas wells that were used by the WSGS to create the oil and gas fields, based on their location, status, and production history. Wells are symbolized by field name and attribute data includes all WOGCC well header information.&lt;/SPAN>&lt;/P>&lt;/DIV>&lt;/DIV>&lt;/DIV></abstract>

  </links>
  <dates/>
  <fees></fees>
  <rights>The Wyoming State Geological Survey (WSGS) compiled, QCed, and, in some cases, corrected well data from information downloaded from the Wyoming Oil and Gas Conservation Commission (WOGCC) as of January 5, 2023.</rights>
